I have a big problem with taking melatonin. At any dosage it gives me the more horrific nightmares that I cannot wake from. They don't even feel like mine; I don't have nightmares like these. I've read that others have this problem too. And I know people who don't have any problem with it.

Also, when I was studying, I was taught that if you take it, your body will stop making it. I don't know if that is true. I tend to believe AW, but since I can't take it, I have no way of knowing.
